pullrequest.title: Joint control menu read current values

content.raw:
I realized that the joint names are all scoped, so there are a few options:

1. Use `std::bind` to pass the model name to the callback (what I did here).

2. Extract the model name from the joint name in the joint command response (avoids needing to use `std::bind` here).

3. Check whether the joint specified in the response is in each controller list individually (e.g. substitute `this->dataPtr->sliders.find(_rep.name())` in line [475](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2730/joint-control-menu-read-current-values/diff#Lgazebo/gui/JointControlWidget.ccT475) below).
